creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text:
This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report.   

Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: 

In many ways the word “great” had been stolen from us. We, and our “greatness” are being held hostage. I think of it just as the “leadership” decided to suspend the immigration to the US. Our house had been plundered and, step by step, turned into a prison. We are living in a failed state.
title: April 21, 2020: GREAT.
